item.description: Experience authentic German cuisine and genuine German Biers in an old world atmosphere with servers in dirndls.  There will be singing, hats, and a fun atmosphere with Walter Lawrence playing the accordion.  This is sure to be a great night with a lot of laughter.  You’ll meet new people and have a delicious meal.  Come join us!  To reserve, call Gail 860-582-8229.  Directions to 131 Dwight Street:  I-84 to 72E, take Exit 9 Main Street, at top of ramp turn right, at light turn left onto Chestnut Street, turn left at 3rd light onto Stanley Street, take 2nd right onto Dwight Street, facility on right after 1st stop sign.
item.how_to_find_us: Tell them you are with our group.

group.who: Come join us for a FUN time!
group.name: Singles Social Connections

item.name: Singles Dinner Evening
